title: One-pot steak and pasta casserole
ingredients: ['1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '340g (12 oz) lean braising steak, cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tin chopped tomatoes, about 400g', '2 tbsp tomato purée', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 litre (1 3/4 pints) beef or vegetable stock', '3 large carrots, sliced', '4 celery sticks, sliced', '1 small swede, chopped', '225g (8 oz) fusilli (pasta spirals)', '1 tbsp chopped fresh oregano or 1 tsp dried oregano', 'salt and pepper']
